OBJECTIVE.query: Maximize the bandwidth of the link between A and E that passes through C.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The sum of bandwidths of paths A -> C and C -> E must be greater than or equal to the bandwidth of A -> E.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via C must be at least the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The sum of bandwidths of paths A -> D and D -> E must be greater than or equal to the bandwidth of A -> E.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via D must be at least the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> C -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via C and then E must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> D -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via D and then E must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> C -> D -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via C, D, and E must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> D -> C -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via D, C, and E must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via B must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> D -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via B, D, and E must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> C -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via B, C, and E must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> D -> C -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via B, D, C, and E must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> C -> D -> E must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via B, C, D, and E must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> C -> D -> E -> A must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{AB} + x_{BC} + x_{CD} + x_{DE} + x_{EA} \le x_{AE}
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via B, C, D, E, and back to A must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> C -> D -> E -> B must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{AB} + x_{BC} + x_{CD} + x_{DE} + x_{EB} \le x_{AE}
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via B, C, D, E, and back to B must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> C -> D -> E -> C must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{AB} + x_{BC} + x_{CD} + x_{DE} + x_{EC} \le x_{AE}
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total bandwidth from A to E via B, C, D, E, and back to C must be at most the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.

CONSTRAINTS.query: The bandwidth of the path A -> B -> C -> D -> E -> D must be less than or equal to the bandwidth of the direct A -> E link.
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{AB} + x_{BC} + x_{CD} + x_{DE} + x_{ED} \le x_{AE}
